question: You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Australia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.Write a letter to the couple. In your letterexplain why you think you would be suitable for the jobsay what else you could do for the familygive reasons for wanting the job
text: I am writing this letter in response to your advertisement related to a teacher who can teach your children the English language for about a year.

Firstly, I would like to mention a few things that will tell you that I am quite suitable for this post. I have been teaching this particular language for over 10 years near my hometown and even through online portals as well. Also, I have qualified in A2 level from Oxford University so your youngster will learn this language with perfection.
If you want I can teach your youngsters other subjects as well and along with that, and I have done babysitter work as well so if you both are working your kids will be in safe hands in your absence.

Lastly, I am keen interested when I got to know that I will get chance to teach students whose residence is near to my University. I believe your reaching your residence is not a challenge for me because I can teach him when I finish off with my own classes.
I hope to hear a positive response from your end.
